title: E196 THE MOTHER OF THE PAUL BROTHERS - IMPAULSIVE EP. 196
itunes:title: THE MOTHER OF THE PAUL BROTHERS - IMPAULSIVE EP. 196
description:
She’s the mother of all mothers and the sweetest of all sweets. So how did she produce two of the internet’s biggest hooligans? In this episode, Pam reminisces on her athletic upbringing, why she fell in love with Greg Paul, how she deals with the hate directed at her children, and more...


Use code IMPAULSIVE to get 10% OFF your next purchase of Jade Black sunglasses https://bit.ly/37OgpQz
